comment._content: Hi, I'm an admin for a group called Vintage Amarillo, and we'd love to have this added to the group!

comment.author: 76204898@N00
comment._content:
Panhandle, Texas is a town a few miles northeast of Amarillo. This is likely where this picture was taken. Large, restored version:
